metadata.description: The Asprey Bugatti, La Voiture Noire. A one-of-one physical gold sculpture made at Asprey's London workshop linked with NFT artwork. A further optional black (Noire) sculpture is available exclusively to the owner of this NFT. The artwork has the primary brand colours of Bugatti and Asprey reflecting centuries of heritage and celebrating the future of this incredible partnership.
metadata.name: Asprey Bugatti La Voiture Noire 1:1
